geneLabelsOrder - Variable in class DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGenerator
list of names used as labels for genes in this generator
geneLabelsOrder - Variable in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
Labels (possibly HUGO symbols) associated with genes considered in the analisys
genotype - Variable in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
the state of mutations relative of this node
GenotypeGraph - package GenotypeGraph
 
GenotypeGraph - Class in GenotypeGraph
Basic class to represent directed graphs about genotypes.
GenotypeGraph(String[], ArrayList<boolean[]>) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
default constructor, creates a graph consisting of many genotype nodes
GenotypeGraph(String[], ArrayList<boolean[]>, int) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
Alternate constructor also setting a threshold on the maximum number of genes
GenotypeGraph() - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
Alternate constructor reading input from STDIN TODO add file support
GenotypeGraph(int) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
Alternate constructor reading input from STDIN and setting a threshold on the maximum number of genes to be considered
GenotypeGraphSimple - Class in GenotypeGraph
Generates a graph connecting all nodes with equal genotypes but for a single extra mutation in the receiver of the edge
GenotypeGraphSimple(String[], ArrayList<boolean[]>) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
Default constructor
GenotypeGraphSimple(String[], ArrayList<boolean[]>, int) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
Alternate consuctor with limited number of considered genes
GenotypeGraphSimple() - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
Default constuctor reading dataset from STDIN
GenotypeGraphSimple(int) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
Alternate consuctor with limited number of considered genes reading dataset from STDIN
genotypeLength() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
 
GenotypeMarkovNode - Class in GenotypeGraph
TODO re-implement with adjacency matrix if needed
GenotypeMarkovNode(String) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeMarkovNode
Default Constructor, creates a node of a Markov Chain with a given label
GenotypeNode - Class in GenotypeGraph
A base class for a single node from a genotype graph (based on adjacency matrix)
GenotypeNode(boolean[], int) - Constructor for class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
Default constructor, creates a node labeled with a genotype
get(int, int) - Method in class GenotypeGraph.SquareMatrix
Gets the value of a cell
getBestEdges(int, int, int[]) - Method in class GenotypeGraph.WeightedGenotypeGraph
Given a node, returns a list of size less or equal than limit of its edges with maximum weight It also updates visit information for the reached nodes
getChildrenOf(GenotypeNode) - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
 
getGenotype() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
Getter for the genotype of this node
getId() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
 
getLabel() - Method in class MutationGraph.TRaITNode
 
getLabels() - Method in class DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGenerator

getLabels() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraph
 
getNumberOfMutations() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeNode
 
getParentsOf(GenotypeNode) - Method in class GenotypeGraph.GenotypeGraphSimple
 
getSize() - Method in class GenotypeGraph.SquareMatrix
 
GraphDatasetGenerator - Class in DatasetGenerators
Class for creating a generic weighted graph of genotypes from which to generate data sets to be used for the validation of tumor evolution inference methods NOTE: might be interesting to use this as input for other tools TODO add output on STDOUT
GraphDatasetGenerator(String[]) - Constructor for class DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGenerator
Default constructor (empty graph, manual construction)
GraphDatasetGenerator(int) - Constructor for class DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGenerator
Alternate constructor (random graph with n genes)
GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations - Class in DatasetGenerators
Extension of GraphDatasetGenerator that produces genotype graph where it is possible to have multiple acquisitions of mutations as a single event (when this happen is impossible to acquire part of them alone)
GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations(int) - Constructor for class DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations
 
GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations(String[]) - Constructor for class DatasetGenerators.GraphDatasetGeneratorAllowingMultipleMutations
